name: 2D Endless Runner Prototype (Cyborg Escape)
description:
A simple endless runner game i was making when i was 1st learning unity3d game development and optimization in games.

Run for your life and dodge enemies to escape earth before it gets destroyed, Pssst you can attack the enemies with your amazing shooting skills ;D.

Contains:

- High frame rate.

- 3 Modes of gameplay with one code ( Easy, Normal, Hard )

- 2 Languages. ( English, Arabic )

Learned about co-routines, states, singleton and how to optimize your code to take your game achieve high frame rate 60 FPS :D.
